page.title: 14HOME LIFE
page.content: In the morning at about 8.45 I leave for school. My Dad goes to work at the same time. My Dad works in the high flats. He works in the flats we stay in. He brushes and mops the stairs. He is a caretaker. We get a free house because of this. We get the telephone free, and we don't have to pay rent. At 12.50 my Dad runs my Mum to work in his car. His car is a Vauxhall Viva. It is a T registration which means that it was made between August 1978 and July 1979. My Mum works just off Dundee Street in a children's nursery. She works there from 1.00 to 4.30. I come home from school at 3.15. At 4.20 I go with my Dad in his car to pick my Mum up. We arrive back about 4.40. My Mum makes the tea at this time. My favourite tea is mince and potatoes. I watch television after tea. Sometimes I go out to play.I go to bed at 10.00.
